title: Textile, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: plain compound satin with supplementary weft
creditline: Gift of the Museum of the Cranbrook Academy of Art
description: Flowers and acanthus leaves in gold on silver background. Flowers shaded red, blue, violet and green. Fragment has trimming of silk stripes.
